dill_tils.flask package

Submodules

dill_tils.flask.recaptcha module

dill_tils.flask.recaptcha.is_human(captcha_response: dict, secret: str)

Validating recaptcha response from google server Returns True captcha test passed for submitted form else returns False.

Keyword arguments: captcha_response – dict: contains users response to captcha challenge secret – str: Secret key for Google reCAPTCHA
